title: When you see a Bard portal, and you just have to take it even though it is a bad idea

replies.body: What was her plan?
One does not need a plan to go on a magical journey.

You guys plan those?

#supportmain
Hey man..it's not his fault your EUW.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
It's "OK" {{champion:33}}
Oi!
to make money and lol's by pretending to get hurt.
Just like a {{champion:412}} lantern, you have to take it, no matter the cost

Ha, you think people click on the lantern...
cute

> [{quoted}](name=DErpMAstEr651,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=xzJ4fygT,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-03-16T17:37:39.801+0000)
>
> Ha, you think people click on the lantern...
> cute

My whole team always click the lantern.
Sad to say, my adc tends to be the slowest on the uptake though :<

It's even better when this...

Toss lantern...
YOU flash through wall, expecting people to click lantern...
Your whole team flashes through wall...
...
...

I think all ADC's are slow on the uptake.
-shots fired-
There's an irony in using the term "shots fired" to refer to a group who are mostly gunslingers.
Well I can't exactly use "Vayne's Salted"
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=Rendarkan,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=xzJ4fygT,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-16T21:25:02.904+0000)
>
> I think all ADC's are slow on the uptake.
> -shots fired-

I go ADC about a third of the time, and I can confirm this. xD
so true.......#threshstruggles
The heretics shall be purged in the fires of the mighty lantern.

Same with Lee Sin and Yasuo

If you see a cross-screen dash you take that shit no questions asked

starts at 07:45 =D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8b7mO-Rs7s
That yi, man. I busted a nut laughing at that goku scream
{{champion:11}} : AUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUGH! *has been slain*
Now when can we start an all-Bard game mode? Imagine the journeys!
ALL FOR ONE!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=kaltenashes,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=xzJ4fygT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-16T14:53:09.150+0000)
>
> starts at 07:45 =D
> 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8b7mO-Rs7s

Holy shit that is painful to watch. Everything after the Bard shenanigans.

I feel the same way with ARAM snowballs
> If the snowball hits, you must commit

Not even the pros can say no.
https://youtu.be/HumfzOQMs7A

[Even the forum agrees](http://i.imgur.com/6cAQb1W.png)

You have to take the snowball
https://media.giphy.com/media/CcUk4a6fkgUfu/giphy.gif
I'm fucking dying :D
if you didn't see the all star match you should watch that one... Not only did it happen that time it happened immediately after this again which made it even better... In the end DL went 3-0
My mind's telling me nooooo~! But my body!.... My body'sssss TELLING ME YEEEEEEESSSSS~!!!

I don't know Japanese but i'm pretty sure she's saying

"AAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHH, MUH BONES!"
http://media0.giphy.com/media/xkYkgcptz3OmI/giphy.gif
Oh I baited many of my allies on such interesting death traps. uhehehehehe

I remember when I was doing tryouts for my ranked team and I was writing critiques for a potential mid laner. One of the comments was: "Don't take a magical journey without vision." Yeeaaaaah.... I think you can guess what happened.....

I do have a channel with japanese women wrestling.

I may start watching it.
OMG that gif made me laugh so hard.

I watched teammates in my last game take the magical journey.  It ended in a magical quadra kill for their ADC.  I backed and said yes to the FF that came from the team.   Them dying was all my fault too lol.
lol, your not the only one, a magical journey that ends with your and all your allies death.... thats the reason why i dont use that skill so much nowadays
nu merge..
I can relate.
I do the same thing with Thresh lanterns.
Now if only you came out of his portal at high speed, then we'd see some fun.
The best is when Bard is standing there then stuns you while the jungler picks up a free kill off you. Then Bard laughs.
